column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food is great
column3: but the wait times are obnoxiously long. I've been here on several Saturday mornings
column4: and it always takes about 30 minutes to be seated
column5: and then another 30+ minutes to get your food. This works out well if you're meeting for brunch since the coffee is free
column6: and you have plenty of time to talk
